title: $:/plugins/ajh/showfields
author: Andrew
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/language/showfields/caption": { "text": "Show Fields", "title": "$:/language/showfields/caption" }, "$:/language/showfields/hint": { "text": "Add field to list:", "title": "$:/language/showfields/hint" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/controls": { "text": "\define remove() -[[$(currentTiddler)$]] \define lingo-base() $:/language/EditTemplate/ \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/list' $subfilter='+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]'/> \end <$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/list]]'>
<$droppable actions=<>>
 
<$button class=<>> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/list' $field='list' $subfilter=<>/> <$link to={{!!title}}> <$view field='caption'><$view field='title'/>
{{$:/language/showfields/hint}} <$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/newfieldname' tag='input' default='' placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Name/Placeholder}} focusPopup=<> class='tc-edit-texteditor tc-popup-handle'/> <$button popup=<> class='tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-dropdown' tooltip={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Dropdown/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Field/Dropdown/Caption}}>{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type='nomatch' text='' default=''>
<$linkcatcher to='$:/temp/newfieldname'>
<>
<$list filter='[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]search:title{$:/temp/newfieldname}sort[]]' variable='currentField'> <$link to=<>> <>
<>
<$list filter='[fields[]search:title{$:/temp/newfieldname}sort[]] -[!is[shadow]!is[system]fields[]]' variable='currentField'> <$link to=<>> <>
<$button> <$action-listops $tiddler='$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/list' $field='list' $subfilter={{$:/temp/newfieldname}}/> <>
", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/controls", "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/Settings", "caption": "{{$:/language/showfields/caption}}" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/readme": { "text": "This plugin adds to the settings tab in the control panel. It provides a field selector to add or remove fields to be viewed if any tiddler has them. Drag and drop selected to change the ordering. Also, optionally add to a tiddler the field named ''show-field'' and in its contents add field names with or without a minus in front to show or hide them in that tiddler only. Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/showfields to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload. This plugin comprises: * Control settings * Template * Caption and hint", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/readme" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/icon": { "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/icon", "tags": "$:/tags/Image" }, "$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/template": { "text": "\define body() <$list filter='[list[$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/list]] $(showfield)$' variable='listItem'> <$list filter='[all[current]has]'> ''<>'': <$transclude field=<>/> \end <$reveal type='nomatch' state=<> text='hide' retain='yes' animate='yes'> <$set name='showfield' value={{!!show-field}}> <>
", "title": "$:/plugins/ajh/showfields/template", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate" } } }
